comment._content: Presumably the same Reginald Vanderbilt at www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163511604/ See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DE7DD143DE433A... for a report on the horseshow. The husband of Mrs. C. W. Watson was the most successful horseman of the show.
